Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory285.png'}
{3: "You board a reinforced defense ship and leaves the Red Tide with the Support Force's help."}
{3: 'Everyone wears protective gear and the ship itself has been reinforced, but the highly concentrated Punishing Virus still finds its way in and causes symptoms of infection in everyone.'}
{3: 'After receiving first-aid, you all look over the abandoned area.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'This place seems to have been an office area.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I thought a business area was the same as a business street.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "They do sound very similar, but they're actually different. I've been here on several rescue missions... a business area has more people and Corrupted than a business street.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "So it's like a factory, then? I focus so much on fighting that I never paid attention to their difference. I mean, they've both been destroyed beyond recognition, so...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But there is one thing I know about an industrial district.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'The number of Corrupted.', 3: '15'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Exactly.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We've reached a forkâ€”the road splits into left and right. Which path are we taking?", 4: '3'}
{2: "Lee, what's your thought?", 3: '18', 4: "Lucia, it's up to you!", 5: '19', 6: 'Liv, any thought?', 7: '20'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't have enough clues to say much. They look the same.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I can't tell you why, but I think we should go right.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I think we should go left. It feels more peaceful.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Where do these paths lead?'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We now have a rough idea where these paths lead. It's you call, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It is quite obvious that the road on the left has fewer Corrupted. Most of them are crowding up on the right.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Left or right?'}
